title: Destroy Gunners SP v1.26 Apk-XpoZ
description:
Some of the greatest SNK arcade games of all time are now here in this compilation pack. Volume 1 includes 16 of the best games from the SNK catalog in one compilation. Included are Art of Fighting, Baseball Stars 2, Burning Fight, Fatal Fury, King of Fighters '94, King of the Monsters, Last Resort, Magician Lord, Metal Slug, Neo Turf Masters, Samurai Shodown, Sengoku, Shock Troopers, Super Sidekicks 3, Top Hunter and World Heroes!

Destroy Gunners SP?brought out the limitation of the performance of the newest smartphones.
This title is new generation 3D action shooting game that exceeded any past game machines.
A player can control realistic armed robot intuitively by touch panel control
and any player can experience impressive battle scenes easily.
